definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
to find amusement in one's own way/to enjoy oneself quietly
doing as one pleases (idiom); foot-loose and fancy free

sentences.english: Great joy of reading, not to invite good name.
sentences.chinese: 自得讀書樂，不邀爲善名。

sentences.english: I'm not going to overenjoy it just because it might be my last.
sentences.chinese: 我不會因爲這是最後一個賽季就怡然自得。

sentences.english: And poking around in ruins would never be quite the same enjoyable pastime.
sentences.chinese: 再到廢墟中徒步旅行時就不會象過去一樣悠然自得。

sentences.english: Carrie observed his ease with some misgiving.
sentences.chinese: 看到他這樣悠閒自得，嘉莉不免有些疑惑。

sentences.english: Sleeping naked on benches by the lake under the sun of summer, is quite a leisure that I can certainly enjoy.
sentences.chinese: 夏天的時候坦腹睡在岸邊的長凳上，也是自得其樂。

sentences.english: One needs space to be oneself.
sentences.chinese: 人要有空間才能怡然自得。

sentences.english: The vast sea allows fishes to leap about, and open sky leaves birds to glide.
sentences.chinese: 海空任魚躍，天高任鳥飛，悠悠然自得其樂。

sentences.english: Happily enjoyed peanuts on the benches under the shades.
sentences.chinese: 曾經在悠然自得的坐在樹蔭下剝花生。

sentences.english: Leonard pottered round the greenhouse, tying up canes for the tomatoes.
sentences.chinese: 倫納德在溫室裏悠然自得地給西紅柿綁上撐杆。

sentences.english: The two dragons swam in between, leisurely and sea.
sentences.chinese: 兩條龍游弋於雲海之間，悠然自得。

sentences.english: But those long lazy summers disappeared too fast.
sentences.chinese: 那些長長的夏日，悠閒自得，可惜消逝得太快。

sentences.english: Also, nerds get a high out of building stuff.
sentences.chinese: 書呆子們在建設某種東西的過程中自得其樂。

sentences.english: Five dragon swam in between, leisurely and sea.
sentences.chinese: 五條龍游弋於雲海之間，悠然自得。

sentences.english: Banbo not be very kind to dust Zi, extremely Chan Yan and get its own integration.
sentences.chinese: 要極其斑剝而不類於塵滓，極其巉巖而自得其融和。

sentences.english: This is me, a lonely but somebody's butterflies.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我，一隻落寞但是卻自得其樂的蝴蝶。

sentences.english: And their philosophy is " I know I how to earn money when I know how to spend money".
sentences.chinese: 他們的格言是“能花才更能賺”，花光用光自得其樂。

definition: to boast/to blow one's own horn
to find amusement in one's own way/to enjoy oneself quietly
